page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT in WGC.
page.content: There are {1,700 }people unemployed in Welwyn Garden City. 1 in 5 people are let down each week at interviews.Although the rate of employment is high {80-90 }people still get jobs each week. People over 40 find it difficult to get jobs. There is a Youth Training Scheme for employed or unemployed{16}year olds and some unemployed{17}year olds. You can spend{12 }months in the scheme during which time you will get general training and work experience.The most popular jobs in WGC.are in offices and in the field of engineering. Occasionally vacancies for the armed services are filled by applicants from the job centre. Even the vacancy for a dolphin trainer was recently filled by a WGC applicant!!!
